scripts.dev:concurrent: concurrently -n "checkin-chat,checkin-voice,backend,frontend" -c "cyan,magenta,green,blue" "npm run dev:checkin-chat" "npm run dev:checkin-voice" "npm run dev:backend-wait" "npm run dev:frontend-wait"
scripts.dev:checkin-chat: cd ../checkin-chat/files && cross-env PORT=8000 python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.dev:backend-wait: wait-on tcp:8000 tcp:8001 && cd new_backend && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend-wait: wait-on http://localhost:5000/health && cd ../frontend && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd new_backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
